title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 build 2 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:00 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。 然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。 Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 正式版 仍未发布， 1.2 build 2 为其第 2 个测试版 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  https://feedback.minecraft.net/knowledgebase/articles/1196212-minecraft-win10-android-beta-1-2-build-2Several improvements to navigating the recipe book操纵配方书的一些改善Improved performance when scrolling through the recipe book改善滚动配方书界面的表现Improved performance when looking at many item frames改善盯着许多物品展示框时的表现Improved performance when encountering Blazes改善遭遇烈焰人的表现Fixed performance issue when holding a locator map while other players are nearby修复玩家在持有定位地图，其他玩家经过时的错误表现Player faces will no longer disappear from maps玩家的头像不会从地图中消失了Fixed draw distance being limited to 6, even on high memory devices不管是不是高内存设备都将渲染距离限制到6Fixed a crash when crafting fireworks from the recipe book修复在配方书中合成烟花的崩溃Fixed a crash that could occur when loading into a single player world修复载入单人世界时可能的崩溃Fixed a crash that occurred when traveling through Nether and End portals while the inventory screen was open修复在背包界面打开时进入下界或末地导致的崩溃Fixed a crash when using the '/summon falling_block' command修复使用 '/summon falling_block' 命令造成的崩溃Fixed several crashes when disconnecting from games修复在游戏断开连接时可能的崩溃Improved performance of chunk generation after teleporting and at game start改善在传送后和游戏开始时区块生成的表现Improved performance with oceans by removing dynamic water blocks改善海洋，移除动态水方块Hoppers will now only send redstone signals upwards漏斗只会向上发出红石信号Fixed End Portal textures when viewed at a far distance修复远距离观察时末地传送门显示的材质问题Commands that target entities will no longer affect entities across all dimensions命令指定的实体不会影响其他世界中的实体Slightly lowered the amount of hostile mobs that spawn减少敌对生物的生成数量Bed icons in the command chat now appear correctly命令聊天中的床的图标显示正确了Rideable mobs will no longer kick players from their backs when stepping into one-block-deep water可骑乘的生物不会在进入一格深的水中就让玩家从生物身上下来了Dying with items in a crafting area will no longer persist after death在合成台合成物品时死亡时物品不会存留了Beacons can now be tinted using stained glass panes信标可以使用染色玻璃板变色了Fixed parrots' names not appearing correctly when riding on a player修复了在玩家肩上时鹦鹉的名字显示不正确的BugFixed newly joined players seeing riding parrots in the wrong positions修复新加入玩家视角中骑乘中的鹦鹉位置错误的BugTamed parrots can no longer be taken by other players驯服的鹦鹉不能被其他玩家带走了Redstone comparators now properly test for valid power sources红石比较器现在能够正确测试信号源Comparators will no longer trigger a short pulse when placed adjacent to a detector rail with a minecart on top在邻近的探测铁轨经过矿车时比较器不会输出短红石信号了Fixed the durability bar always staying green on enchantment table, furnace, and anvil screens修复在附魔台，熔炉和铁砧界面中耐久条常绿的BugLightning no longer strikes biomes that don't rain闪电不会在不会下雨的生物群系中生成了Mobs can no longer detect players through solid non-transparent blocks怪物不能通过非运输实体方块检测到玩家了Blazes and Endermites will now retaliate when attacked by other mobs烈焰人和末影螨在被其他生物攻击时会反击了Fixed an issue that caused the description to clear in the 3D export screen (Windows 10 only)修复3D导出界面中导致描述变空的问题（仅Win10）Fixed missing texture on leather horse armor during 3D export (Windows 10 only)修复在3D导出时马鞍的材质消失的问题（仅Win10）The '/give' command can now give multiple non-stacking items without failing/give 命令现在能够给予多个非堆叠型的物品了Volume will now change while adjusting the volume sliders and sounds will no longer overlap while adjusting音量能够通过调整滑条控制，音效不会在调整时重叠Fixed the item icon for broken Elytra Wings showing as another random item修复损坏的滑翔翼的物品图标展示为其他随机物品的BugFirework star recipe will now appear in the recipe book while in survival and ingredients will appear in the crafting grid in creative烟火之星的合成会出现在生存模式的配方书中，材料会出现在创造模式的合成网格中Removed the recipe to craft white wool using bone meal and white wool移除通过使用骨粉和白色羊毛合成白色羊毛的合成方式Colored wool can now be dyed white with bone meal染色羊毛现在能通过骨粉染回白色Fixed the item durability bar be dislocated when opening the inventory修复打开物品栏时物品的耐久条错位的问题Light Blue Stained Glass and Stained Glass Pane no longer have placeholder names浅蓝色染色玻璃和染色玻璃板不会使用变量名了The text box will now appear when placing a sign that has been renamed using an anvil聊天栏现在会在放置已经被铁砧重命名的告示牌时出现Fixed name tags over renamed entities always being visible修复一些重命名过的实体的名字牌总是可见的问题Using pick block will no longer show the name of the previously held item使用选择方块按键不会展示之前持有物品的名字When using the '/clone' command, overlapping chests and their contents will now be replaced, not merged使用/clone命令会将箱子和其中内容替换，而不是合并Vines can no longer exist in only-bottom-side-block position藤蔓不会在只有一个底面的方块的位置处生成了The '/clear' command no longer activates if the conditions are not met/clear 命令如果条件不满足就不会激活了Fixed players stopping hitting things if there is nothing to hit修复如果没有可以击中的东西的话玩家会停止挥拳的问题Fixed the transparency of the Ender Dragon wings on Vanilla textures修复原版材质末影龙翅膀的透明度Fixed horizontal seams that were visible around flames on burning entities修复展示框和燃烧实体的横向接缝可见问题Animals that have been fed an item for breeding can no longer be fed anymore until the cooldown wears off被喂食的动物直到冷却结束不能被再次喂食了Fixed Silverfish not spawning from Monster Egg blocks修复从怪物蛋石砖中蠹虫不生成的问题Smoothed the animation of falling asleep平滑化玩家躺到床上的动画The game will now launch in the language selected as the default device language with Android OS 6.0 and 7.0 (Android only)Android的6.0和7.0版本中游戏会以设备所使用的语言作为默认语言启动（仅安卓）Pressing RB will no longer scroll through all skins in the skin picker现在不能在皮肤选择器中通过按下RB来滚动浏览皮肤
